pkgmetadata.longdescription: FVWM-Crystal is a set of configuration files for FVWM window manager, with additional programs and scripts. Some of it's features are: * quick launching of a terminal with just one click on a desktop * a specially configured terminal window, similar to a console from FPP games * builtin control over XMMS player and over aumix mixer from the keyboard and buttons on the screen * very good ability to control the desktop from the keyboard, including window switching, moving, shading/unshading, maximizing, resizing, moving between desktop pages * transparent window titlebars, menus and panels on the desktop
